basics.name: Alec Lomas
basics.label: Frontend Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a frontend developer with a passion for legibility, performance, and the open web. Coming from a design background, I bring strong product sense and a keen eye for detail to every project.

work.name: Data Theorem
work.summary: Built dashboards for application security platform using TypeScript & React. Contributed to a major overhaul of the entire UI, including designing missing screens & functionality. Rebuilt the marketing site from the ground-up.

work.name: Allma
work.summary: Built Slack bot for incident collaboration using TypeScript & associated web application with React. Contributed to UI/UX design of both projects. Worked with team to create a comprehensive frontend style guide.

work.name: Carvana
work.summary: Developed applications using TypeScript & React for the underwriting team. Worked with others to shape the direction of product features and UI/UX.

work.name: HiringSolved
work.summary: Developed a next-generation candidate matching tool using React & GraphQL. Collaborated with other stakeholders to shape product & feature direction. Built a flexible, extensive design system library to reduce boilerplate & enforce design consistency across applications.

work.name: Fuel Made
work.summary: Worked directly with clients and other stakeholders to deliver exceptional, high-conversion eCommerce websites on the Shopify platform. Created tools to standardize and expedite internal developer experience.

work.name: meltmedia
work.summary: Created components & design framework for the Adobe Experience Manager platform. Worked with QA team to create React- and Vue-based services that empower PMO & clients to self-test websites. Member of frontend code style & UI/UX standards teams.
